file_content.text: The weak will be sacrificed here to make the Forge stronger.
You've won--why has the Force guided me to this defeat?
The darkness at your core makes you powerful. Strong enough to destroy the Sith.
You're stronger than any Jedi I've known. You could redeem the order and destroy the Sith.
I understand. You are the weapon I came to forge.
You don't have a destiny, Bengel. You're sick. You need help.
You're misguided.
Don't deny the truth. Think--how else could you have beaten me?
You think I'm destined to defeat the Empire?
Me?
I'm certain of it. I found my purpose, at last.
I hope you'll appreciate the irony of me killing you.
Wonderful--now die.
You don't have to strike me down. I am your servant now.
I have spent a lifetime learning the paths to power. That knowledge is now yours.
Let me leave Tython and prepare the galaxy for your ascendance. I will deliver the gifts you need to claim your destiny.
You'll get the help you need, Bengel--but you can't leave here.
Rest now. [Knock him out]
Give me the things I'll need to defeat my enemies, and you can live.
We have a deal.
My first gift lies inside the Forge, where Force users created their lightsabers millennia ago.
I have learned their forgotten ways--discovered how to create a truly powerful weapon. I will show you....
Use my knowledge to make your lightsaber, and the Force will be with you.
I must leave, but I will find you when the time is right. Farewell....
T7 = let Bengel Morr go // Decision = against Jedi Council orders
What the Council doesn't know won't hurt it. Hold still....
There. How do you feel?
T7 memory logs = corrupted // Last data = entering Forge
T7 + Jedi = save Master Orgus + defeat Bengel Morr?
We did it, my little friend.
[Lie] That's right.
T7 + Jedi = heroes!
You took a hit in the fight--must have short-circuited. But we defeated Bengel Morr.
You don't remember?
Jedi report = good news // T7 = fully functioning again
You got hit when we entered the clearing. I did all the hard work.
[Lie] You were shot.
T7 = sorry for missing Jedi victory // T7 = dodge better next time
Master Orgus = unconscious // Jedi = help him?
I'll make my own destiny--and you need to die.
No thanks. [Kill him]
I sensed you coming. Your fear betrayed you.
You're weak, like my old Master. You will fall. With him.
What happened to you on Coruscant? Why have you turned against the Jedi?
Tell me why you hate us.
Not the Jedi--the sick, spineless cowards that have taken their place. The traitors who let the Sith slaughter millions.
You're not hurting anyone else, Bengel. It's over.
No, I'll stop you.
No. The will of the Force guided me here for justice, to restore what the Jedi lost.
You weren't on Coruscant. You never saw our greatest cut down or watched the temple burn.
I escaped that destruction to see my own Master surrender to the Sith. They exterminated us, and he gave up.
You're wrong about Master Orgus. He's training me to defeat the Sith.
We'll never give up.
The dark side has already taken root in you. I sense it.
Weapons are only as strong as those who created them.
That's why you brought Master Orgus here? To make him pay?
This is about revenge?
If what you say is true, Orgus should die.
Then he deserves death.
This isn't about revenge. One death changes nothing.
The Jedi Order must be reborn from ashes....
Spare me the speeches. I'm here to end you.
Enough. [Attack]
So be it.
Tython belongs to the true Jedi. Leave, or you will die.
